featured.text: He remembered a kind of glue developed by a colleague that everyone thought 18 a failure because it did not stick very well.
He then coated the glue on a paper sample and found that it was not only a good bookmark, but it was great for writing notes.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於將物體粘合在一起的粘合劑。
definition.en_def: A substance used for sticking objects together.
definition.example: I need some glue to fix this broken vase.
